name: HarryPotterTopTrumpsQuiz
0: ”Alexa, open harry potter top trumps quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter top trumps quiz
des:
Are you the ultimate Harry Potter fan? Try out this Harry Potter quiz that only Harry Potter fans would know!

Get ready to challenge yourself and team up with players across the globe and compete on the global monthly house leaderboard to see which house is the best!

Every day, you will be given a question to answer and score points for your house.


ALEXA HAVING TROUBLE UNDERSTANDING YOUR ANSWER
Try just saying A, B or C instead
If you're using an Echo Show, try tapping on the answer

Harry Potter Top Trumps Quiz is optimized for Echo devices with a screen, such as the Echo Show and Fire TV, but it also works great on all Alexa enabled devices.

For any questions, support or feedback contact: support@adassainnovations.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
